alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 20 at 2:55PM PST until December 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, icing possible. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to three tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight PST tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
